page.title: 01REVIEW OF CENTRAL SUNDERLAND
page.content: This D Block of{Central Sunderland} consists of an{Urban landscape} containing residential commercial and industrial activities.The{River Wear} forms a border on the north side of this D block and although the block contains urban growth and development as one moves west across this block it is possible to identify the present position of housing communications, transport and trade in relation to local history.The nine schools involved in working within this D block chose eighteen areas of interest which it was felt would present a detailed yet concise picture of the present day life style of an individual living in Central Sunderland.Each school studied two areas of interest across the whole D block.
